name: SPECIAL CARE UNIT
description: Special Care Unit work for people who are seriously ill. These people include those who have had a sudden, general
largeDescription: Special Care Unit work for people who are seriously ill. These people include those who have had a sudden, general malfunction (failure) of an organ, such as the liver, lungs (requiring assistance with breathing), or kidneys (requiring dialysis).Special Care Unit work for people who are seriously ill. These people include those who have had a sudden, general malfunction (failure) of an organ, such as the liver, lungs (requiring assistance with breathing), or kidneys (requiring dialysis).
